description:
Things go awry when the group visits Saki’s private beach. Lala helps Rito study for an upcoming math test, but when the day comes, he cannot remember how to solve the problems. Lala tries to win Rito’s attention, but she is not having much luck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beach Girls / Late Night Private Tutor / Master of Romance
Beach Girls / Le précepteur du soir / La championne de l`amour
Beach Girls / Shin`ya no Kateikyoushi / Ren`ai Master
ビーチ・ガールズ♡ / 深夜の家庭教師 / 恋愛マスター♡
